DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator aim find whether association atherogenic index plasma glucose metabolism.In respect , apart well-known diabetic risk factor , investigator purpose reveal new one .
DOC.brief_title: Relations Between Atherogenic Index Plasma-Glucose Metabolism
DOC.detailed_description: Atherogenic index plasma ( AIP ) relatively new index predictor cardiovascular risk . AIP show associate impaired glucose metabolism . This study aim evaluate relationship AIP parameter glucose metabolism . Methods : This observational study involve 448 healthy individual risk diabetes . They send hospital diabetes check . According 75 g oral glucose tolerance test participant categorize three group ; non-diabetic , prediabetic , diabetic base criterion American Diabetes Association ( ADA ) . The association diabetes group , AIP parameter glucose metabolism analyze . The accuracy registry data compatible medical record . Statistical analysis carry use Statistical Package Social Sciences , Windows version 15.0 ( SPSS , Chicago , Illinois , USA ) . Descriptive statistic variable determine . Normality data distribution assess Kolmogorov-Smirnov test . For continuous variable , non-parametric statistic ( Mann-Whitney Kruskal-Wallis ) , parametric statistic ( t-test , ANOVA analysis ) use appropriate . Statistically significant difference group determine chi-square test categorical variable . Associations variable explore use Pearson correlation Spearman 's rho ( data normally distribute ) . Linear regression analysis backward elimination also perform define variable associate AIP .
DOC.criteria: All participant previously healthy , age 18 80 year , risk diabetes accord new criterion provide American Diabetes Association . Individuals history chronic medical disease report current use medication exclude study
